caption.p: The projected changes to average AMX np- Tyr ( n = 1, 3, 7; T = 20a, 50a) of Upper basin (UB), Yalong River Basin (YRB), Middle basin (MB), Lower basin (LB) and the whole Jinsha River Basin (JRB) with respect to the reference period (1961 to 1990) derived from the projections of RCP4.5 and RCP 8.5 climate scenarios of IPSL-CM5A-LR and MIROC-ESM-CHEM.
